cards.name: Codex of True Names

cards.name: Creeping Oblivion

cards.name: Dance of Doom
cards.text: Play: Choose a number. Destroy each creature with power equal to that number.

cards.name: Gabos Longarms
cards.text: Before Fight: Choose a creature. Gabos Longarms deals damage to that creature rather than the one it is fighting.

cards.name: Greater Oxtet
cards.text:
Taunt.
At the end of your “ready cards” step, purge a card from your hand. If you do, give Greater Oxtet two +1 power counters.

cards.name: Infernal Terran

cards.name: Sneklifter
cards.text: Play: Take control of an enemy artifact. While under your control, if it does not belong to one of your three houses, it belongs to house Shadows.

cards.name: The Long Con
cards.text:
Each friendly Stooge cannot reap.
Action: Make a Stooge. Destroy any number of friendly Stooges. If 6 or more Stooges are destroyed this way, forge a key at no cost and purge The Long Con.

cards.name: Treasure Map
cards.text: Play: If you have not played any other cards this turn, gain 3. For the remainder of the turn, you cannot play cards.

cards.name: Weasand
cards.text:
Deploy. Elusive. 
If Weasand is on a flank, destroy it. 
After a player forges a key, gain 2.

cards.name: Big Sal
cards.text:
Taunt.
Play: Make two token creatures.

cards.name: Booby Trap
cards.text: Play: Deal 4 to a creature that is not on a flank, with 2 splash.

cards.name: Brend the Fanatic
cards.text:
Skirmish.
Play: Your opponent gains 1.
Destroyed: Steal 3.

cards.name: Hidden Stash
cards.text: Play: Archive a card.

cards.name: Kymoor Outpost
cards.text: Action: Put a friendly creature on the bottom of its owner's deck. If you do, steal 1 and make a token creature.

cards.name: Lucky Dice
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Lucky Dice. Friendly creatures cannot be dealt damage during your opponent’s next turn.

cards.name: Murkens
cards.text: Play: Choose a random card in your opponent’s archives or the top card of your opponent’s deck. Play that card as if it were yours.

cards.name: Old Bruno
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Play: Capture 3. (Move 3 from your opponent’s pool to this creature.)

cards.name: Rich Score
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Steal  equal to half the number of friendly token creatures (rounded up).

cards.name: Safe House
cards.text: Action: Archive a friendly creature from play.

cards.name: Subtle Chain
cards.text: Play: Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

cards.name: Whisper
cards.text:
Elusive. 
Action: Lose 1. If you do, destroy a creature.

cards.name: Cover Operation
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature, then ready it.

cards.name: Dodger
cards.text: After Fight: Steal 1.

cards.name: Gamgee
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
After Reap: If your opponent has more  than you, steal 1.

cards.name: Hit and Run
cards.text: Play: Deal 2 to a creature. Return a friendly creature to your hand.

cards.name: Hock
cards.text: Play: Destroy an artifact. If you do, gain 1.

cards.name: Kerwollop
cards.text: Play: Deal 1 to each creature. Gain 1 for each creature destroyed this way.

cards.name: Lamindra
cards.text:
Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.)
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Lamindra’s neighbors gain elusive.

cards.name: Life for a Life
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, deal 6 to a creature.

cards.name: Lurking Hob
cards.text:
Enhance .
After Reap: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Shoulder Id
cards.text:
Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)
Shoulder Id cannot fight.
When Shoulder Id would deal damage, steal 1 instead.

cards.name: Slipshot
cards.text:
After a neighbor of Slipshot is destroyed, ready Slipshot.
Play: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Sneaky Feats
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If you have stolen at least 1 this turn, archive Sneaky Feats.

cards.name: Stooge
cards.text: Action: If Stooge is on a flank, make a token creature.

cards.name: Cleaner
cards.text: Action: Deal 3 to a creature.

cards.name: Prowler
cards.text: After Reap: If your opponent has more  than you, steal 1.

cards.name: Yardbird
cards.text:
Elusive.
Before Fight: Ready another Yardbird.

cards.name: Aero O'Fore
cards.text: While Aero O'Fore is in the center of your battleline, it gains, “After Reap: You may rearrange other friendly creatures in your battleline. Each friendly flank creature captures 2.”

cards.name: Balaenora
cards.text:
Balaenora cannot be played unless your opponent has 7 or more in their pool.
Play: Capture all of your opponent's .
After Fight: Give control of Balaenora to your opponent.

cards.name: Black Tempest
cards.text:
Hazardous 2.
After Fight: If you have no forged keys, steal 3. Otherwise, steal 2.

cards.name: Cloudburst Command
cards.text: Your opponent’s keys cost +1 for each Skyborn creature on a flank.

cards.name: Han Peregrine
cards.text: After Fight/After Reap: You may exalt Han Peregrine. If you do, fully heal a damaged creature and move it to either flank of its controller's battleline.

cards.name: Ley, Earl of Hurl
cards.text: Destroyed: If Ley, Earl of Hurl is not on a flank, fully heal it, exhaust it, ward it, and move it to a flank instead.

cards.name: Maqui Expedition
cards.text: Play: Gain control of an enemy flank creature.

cards.name: Nantucket
cards.text:
Deploy.
After Fight/After Reap: Gain 1 for each of Nantucket’s Skyborn neighbors.

cards.name: Nomadic Insight
cards.text: Play: Each friendly flank creature captures 1.

cards.name: Recreational Jettison
cards.text: Play: Discard a card. Resolve its bonus icons as if you had played it. If a yellow key is forged, repeat the preceding effect.

cards.name: Refined Adhesive
cards.text: Each time a card would be discarded from a player's hand, reveal the card and put it facedown under this creature instead.

cards.name: Treasure Island
cards.text:
Each friendly Skyborn creature gains, “After Reap: Move 1 from your pool to Treasure Island.”
You may spend  on Treasure Island as if it were in your pool.

cards.name: Universal Welcome
cards.text: Play: Take control of the enemy creature in the center of your opponent’s battleline.

cards.name: Viscount of Aerys
cards.text:
While your yellow key is forged, each enemy creature enters play stunned. 
Play: If your yellow key is forged, stun each enemy creature.

cards.name: Æmber Airhart
cards.text: After Fight/After Reap: Shuffle Æmber Airhart into its owner’s deck.

cards.name: Edge of the World
cards.text: Play: Move a creature to a flank of its controller’s battleline. Steal 1.

cards.name: Hunter of Legend
cards.text: This creature gains skirmish and “After Fight: Make a token creature.”

cards.name: Navigator Ketarr
cards.text: After Reap: If Navigator Ketarr is on a flank, draw 2 cards and archive a card.

cards.name: Pirate Champion
cards.text:
Taunt.
After Fight: You may move Pirate Champion to a flank.

cards.name: Red Skies
cards.text: Play: Move a friendly Skyborn creature to a flank and ready it. If a red key is forged, repeat the preceding effect.

cards.name: Redline Rotation
cards.text: Play: If your opponent has 7 or more, steal half of their  (rounding down).

cards.name: Rose of Sharon
cards.text:
Deploy. Elusive.
Action: Choose one of Rose of Sharon’s neighbors. Deal damage to an enemy creature equal to that neighbor’s power. If your red key is forged, repeat the preceding effect.

cards.name: Redhawk
cards.text: Action: Each player gains 1. Make a token creature.

cards.name: Shae “Cloudkicker”
cards.text: Play/After Reap: Swap Shae “Cloudkicker” with another friendly creature in your battleline.

cards.name: Silver Linings
cards.text: Play: Gain 1 for each house represented among friendly flank creatures.

cards.name: The Red Baron
cards.text:
While your red key is forged, The Red Baron gains, “After Reap: Steal 1.”
While your opponent’s red key is forged, The Red Baron gains elusive.

cards.name: Watched Closely
cards.text: This creature gains, “After Reap: Your opponent makes a token creature.”

cards.name: Against All Flags
cards.text: Play: Steal 2 if any flank creature shares a house with another flank creature. Otherwise, steal 1.

cards.name: Bux Bastian
cards.text:
Enhance .
Scrap: Exalt an enemy flank creature.

cards.name: Captain Pella
cards.text:
Enhance .
After Reap: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Chandler Anouk
cards.text: Each friendly flank creature gets +2 armor and gains taunt.

cards.name: Fierce Competition
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If you and your opponent have the same number of forged keys, archive Fierce Competition.

cards.name: Indigo Halyard
cards.text:
While your blue key is forged, Indigo Halyard gains, “After Reap: Ready and fight with another friendly creature.”
While your opponent’s blue key is forged, each of Indigo Halyard’s neighbors gains taunt.

cards.name: Prop Dusting
cards.text: Play: Destroy an enemy flank creature.

cards.name: Raiding Party
cards.text: After Fight: If two keys of the same color are forged, steal 2. Otherwise, steal 1.

cards.name: Safe Port
cards.text: Play: If your yellow key is forged, a friendly creature captures 2. If your opponent’s yellow key is forged, steal 1.

cards.name: Shikari
cards.text:
Play: Make a token creature.
After Fight: Return Shikari to your hand.

cards.name: Skulking Saboteurs
cards.text:
Elusive.
After Reap: If your red key is forged, destroy an enemy creature. If your yellow key is forged, destroy an enemy artifact. If your blue key is forged, destroy an enemy upgrade.

cards.name: The Twin Lamps
cards.text: Play: Steal 1. If you have more  in your pool than your opponent, make a token creature.

cards.name: Efficient Æmber Burner
cards.text:
This creature gains, “Your opponent’s keys cost –1 for each  on this creature .”
This creature gains, “After Reap: Exalt this creature.”

cards.name: Flint's Legend
cards.text: Play: Move 1 from your opponent's pool to Treasure Island.

cards.name: Flint's Map
cards.text: Omni: Search your deck and discard pile for Flint’s Legend, Flint’s Stash, or Treasure Island, reveal the card and archive it.

cards.name: Flint's Stash
cards.text: Each flank creature gains, “Destroyed: Gain 2.”

cards.name: Lateral Thrusters
cards.text: This creature gains, “At the start of your turn, you may rearrange the creatures in your battleline.”

cards.name: Torpefying Harpoon
cards.text: This creature gains, “At the end of your turn, if this creature is not on a flank, destroy it.”

cards.name: Wrangler
cards.text: Action: Each player gains 1.

cards.name: Aerialist
cards.text: While your yellow key is forged, Aerialist gains, “After Reap: Capture 1.”

cards.name: Corsair
cards.text: While your red key is forged, Corsair gets +1 power and gains skirmish.

cards.name: Marketeer
cards.text: While your blue key is forged, Marketeer gains, “Action: Gain 2. Destroy Marketeer.”

cards.name: Blossom Drake
cards.text:
Blossom Drake gets +1 power for each artifact in play. 
Each artifact’s text box is considered blank (except for traits).

cards.name: Briar Grubbling
cards.text: Hazardous 5. (Before this creature is attacked, deal 5 to the attacking enemy.)

cards.name: Chonkers
cards.text:
Skirmish. 
After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Chonkers, double the number of +1 power counters on Chonkers.
Play: Give Chonkers a +1 power counter.

cards.name: Forgotten Guardian
cards.text:
Play: Purge a card from a discard pile.
Scrap: Shuffle a purged card into its owner’s deck.

cards.name: Fuzzy Gruen
cards.text: Play: Your opponent gains 1.

cards.name: Gravid Cycle
cards.text:
Omega. (After you play this card, end this step.)
Play: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Kindrith Longshot
cards.text:
Elusive. Skirmish.
After Reap: Deal 2 to a creature.

cards.name: Niffle Sanctuary
cards.text: Action: Make a Niffle Brute. Until the end of the turn each Niffle Brute gains, “After Fight: Gain 1.”

cards.name: Pestergrove
cards.text: Each creature enters play enraged.

cards.name: Ritual of Life
cards.text: Action: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, return a different creature from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Scout
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, up to 2 friendly creatures gain skirmish. Fight with those creatures one at a time.

cards.name: Stampede
cards.text: Play: If you used 3 or more creatures this turn, steal 2.

cards.name: Witch of the Wilds
cards.text: You may play an Untamed card during each turn in which Untamed is not your active house.

cards.name: Word of Returning
cards.text: Play: Deal 1 to each enemy creature for each  on it. Move each  from those creatures to your pool.

cards.name: World Tree
cards.text: Action: Return a creature from your discard pile to the top of your deck.

cards.name: Cauldron
cards.text: Omni: Put the top card of your deck faceup under Cauldron. If there are 3 or more cards under Cauldron, play them one at a time as if they were in your hand.

cards.name: Fangtooth Cavern
cards.text: At the end of your turn, destroy the least powerful creature.

cards.name: Flaxia
cards.text: Play: Gain 2 if you control more creatures than your opponent.

cards.name: Fogbank
cards.text: Play: Enemy creatures cannot fight during your opponent’s next turn.

cards.name: Harlock
cards.text:
Skirmish.
After Fight: If the creature Harlock fought was destroyed, make a token creature.

cards.name: Kharisma
cards.text:
Elusive.
After Reap: Return another friendly creature to its owner's hand. If you do, make a token creature.

cards.name: Nature’s Call
cards.text: Play: Return up to 3 creatures to their owners’ hands.

cards.name: Niffle Queen
cards.text:
Each other friendly Beast creature gets +1 power.
Each other friendly Niffle creature gets +1 power.

cards.name: Troop Call
cards.text: Play: Return each friendly Niffle creature from your discard pile and from play to your hand.

cards.name: Umwas
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. Give each friendly token creature a +1 power counter.

cards.name: Waste Not
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. Draw cards equal to half that creature’s power (rounding up).

cards.name: Æmberspine Mongrel
cards.text:
Hazardous 3. (Before this creature is attacked, deal 3 to the attacking enemy.)
After an enemy creature reaps, gain 1.

cards.name: Cooperative Hunting
cards.text: Play: For each friendly creature, deal 1 to a creature. (You may choose a different creature each time.)

cards.name: Grovekeeper
cards.text: At the end of your turn, give each neighboring creature a +1 power counter.

cards.name: Keyfrog
cards.text: Destroyed: Forge a key at current cost.

cards.name: Massing at Midnight
cards.text: Play: Make 3 token creatures. Purge Massing at Midnight.

cards.name: Mollymawk
cards.text: Play: Destroy an artifact.

cards.name: Niffle Ape
cards.text: While Niffle Ape is attacking, ignore taunt and elusive.

cards.name: Signal Faerie
cards.text: Play/After Reap: Make a token creature.

cards.name: Song of Spring
cards.text: Play: Shuffle any number of friendly Untamed creatures from your hand, discard pile, or battleline back into your deck.

cards.name: Survival of the Richest
cards.text: Play: Make a token creature. If you have more  than your opponent, archive Survival of the Richest.

cards.name: Unnatural Selection
cards.text: Play: Choose 3 friendly creatures and 3 enemy creatures. Destroy each other creature.

cards.name: Warfaline
cards.text: Play/After Fight: Shuffle the top 5 cards of a discard pile into their owner’s deck.

cards.name: Whimsical Conjuror
cards.text:
Enhance .
When you resolve an  bonus icon, you may make a token creature instead.

cards.name: Niffle Brute
cards.text: Destroyed: If Niffle Sanctuary is in your discard pile, return it to your hand. Otherwise, return a Niffle card from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Briar Instar
cards.text: Hazardous 2.

cards.name: Steppe Wolf
cards.text: Steppe Wolf gets +1 power for each other friendly Wolf creature in play.

cards.name: Twilight Pixie
cards.text: Each of Twilight Pixie’s non-Faerie neighbors gains, “After Reap: Gain 1.”
